name: kanban-board-component
description: Native Kanban board component for CrewKan

scripts.build:
vite build && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('build/index.html', '<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Kanban Board Component</title>
</head>
<body>
    <script src="./index.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
')"
